name: review-code
title: Code Review
description: Perform comprehensive code review with suggestions for improvement

arguments.name: focus_areas
arguments.description: Specific areas to focus on (security, performance, readability, best_practices)

template:
Please review this {{language || 'auto-detect'}} code focusing on {{focus_areas || 'all aspects'}}:

```
{{code}}
```

Provide feedback on code quality, potential issues, and suggestions for improvement.

examples.title: Security-focused review
examples.description: Review code with emphasis on security vulnerabilities
